content:
Manager tip: I'm finding [Next Meeting](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/next-meeting-quickly-see-it-in-your-menu-bar/id1017470484), a simple macOS menubar app, very useful to keep me on top of 1:1s, catch-ups and other events in my work calendar.

![Next Meeting](https://barryf.s3.amazonaws.com/next-meeting.png)
